channel.title: Posts on Jianbo Jiao - University of Oxford
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jianbo Jiao - University of Oxford

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Department of Engineering Science at the University of Oxford, and a member of the Biomedical Image Analysis (BioMedIA) group and the Visual Geometry Group (VGG), advised by Prof. Alison Noble and Prof. Andrew Zisserman. I obtained my Ph.D. in Computer Science from City University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Qingxiong Yang and Prof. Rynson W. H. Lau. I have been lucky to work as a visiting scholar in the Image Formation and Processing(IFP) group at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), advised by Prof.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Self-Supervised Video Representation Learning by Uncovering Spatio-temporal Statistics Jiangliu Wang*, Jianbo Jiao*, Linchao Bao, Shengfeng He, Wei Liu, Yunhui Liu (*Equal contribution) IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (T-PAMI), 2021 This paper subsumes our preliminary work presented at CVPR 2019, with ~30% performance improvement! [PDF] [BibTeX] [Code] Self-Supervised Contrastive Video-Speech Representation Learning for Ultrasound Jianbo Jiao, Yifan Cai, Mohammad Alsharid, Lior Drukker, Aris Papageorghiou, Alison Noble International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention (MICCAI), Oral Presentation (Early Acceptance), 2020

item.title: Teaching

item.title: Services
item.description: Organizing Committee: 25th UK Conference on Medical Image Understanding and Analysis (MIUA 2021) Conference Reviewer: ICLR 2022, NeurIPS 2021, CVPR 2021 (Outstanding Reviewer), IJCAI 2021 (Senior Program Committee member), AAAI 2021, WACV 2021, CVPR 2020, ECCV 2020 (Outstanding Reviewer), MICCAI 2020 (Outstanding Reviewer), AAAI 2020, IJCAI 2020, ACCV 2020, ICCV 2019 (Outstanding Reviewer), CVPR 2019, MICCAI 2019, Pacific Graphics 2018 Journal Reviewer: IEEE T-PAMI, T-IP, T-MI, T-NNLS, T-CSVT, T-Cybernetics, T-MM, Multimedia, Signal Processing Letters; Springer IJCV, Neurocomputing, Journal of Visual Communication and Image Representation (Outstanding Reviewer), Computer Vision and Image Understanding, Computer Graphics Forum
